title: Changelog
text: notable changes project documented file. format based Keep Changelog.

title: Changelog
text: Reduce code duplication nva_search nva_search_aggregations parameter lists (#66) Add missing search filter parameters API supports (#74) Add input validation ‘limit’ parameter across search functions (#70) Fix schema functions used consistently empty returns (#76) Fix nva_cristin_organization_search requiring search parameter (#71) Add type column nva_cristin_organization_search results (#78) Add wrapper cristin/organization/{id}/projects endpoint (#53) Add wrapper cristin/country endpoint (#56) Add documentation explaining singular vs plural function return types (#80) Add ‘sort_order’ parameter nva_search ascending/descending control (#72) Fix nva_cristin_project_search ‘keyword’ parameter use ‘query’ convention (#58) Add wrapper cristin/category/project endpoint (#55) Add wrapper cristin/organization/{id}/persons endpoint (#52) Add README dynamic code examples (#48) Add GitHub Actions workflow pkgdown site deployment (#47) Add getting-started vignette (#39) Add GitHub Actions CI (#42) Add pkgdown site configuration (#40) Add advanced search parameters nva_search() (#38) Add plural tibble getters organizations projects match nva_cristin_persons pattern (#35) Add comprehensive test coverage endpoints (#24) Create nva R package wrapping NVA API (#1) Add documentation tests (#6) Add file download support (nva_download_file) (#5) Add tests Cristin organization endpoints (#11) Add tests Cristin person endpoints (#10) Add tests publication endpoints (#9) Add tests nva_search (#8) Utility functions: nva_extract_id(), nva_get_label(), nva_empty_tibble(), nva_get_tibble() (#12) Schema functions consistent empty result structures (#12) Set testthat infrastructure mock helpers (#7) Implement extended Cristin endpoints (projects, keywords, funding) (#4)

title: Changelog
text: Create nva R package wrapping NVA API (#1) Fix inconsistent output columns nva_search nva_publications (#62) Fix nva_fetch_all using ‘results’ param instead correct API param name (#69) Fix nva_verified_funding_nfr_search parameter naming: ‘nfr_project_id’ follow conventions (#60) Fix nva_download_file parameter naming: ‘file_id’ ‘id’ (#59) Fix nva_cristin_project_search title extraction fragility (#77) Fix nva_download_file using nva_request() infrastructure (#68) Fix nva_download_file using hardcoded incorrect GitHub URL user agent (#67) Fix pkgdown site URL use correct GitHub username (#49) Fix missing dplyr withr test Suggests (#44) Fix year parameter ‘year’ ‘publicationYear’ nva_search (#33)

title: Changelog
text: Fix nva_search function name follow naming convention (#73) Add .Rbuildignore dev files (#45) Add tests schema functions schemas.R (#43) Fix user-agent add DESCRIPTION metadata (#41) Add nva_search_aggregations() separate function search facet counts (#36) Add aggregation support nva_search (#34) Add tests NFR verified funding endpoints (#27) Add tests authentication functions (#30) Add tests API error handling (#29) Add tests fetch_all pagination functionality (#28) Add tests Cristin keyword funding source endpoints (#26) Add tests Cristin project endpoints (#25) BREAKING: Rename results parameter limit across functions (#12) BREAKING: Rename parameter offset NVA endpoints (#12) BREAKING: Rename resource ID parameters id (cristin_id, project_id, etc.) (#12) BREAKING: Rename identifier/identifiers params id/ids publication functions (#12) BREAKING: Rename institution parameter organization (#12) nva_cristin_projects() → nva_cristin_project_search() nva_cristin_keywords() → nva_cristin_keyword_search() nva_cristin_funding_sources() → nva_cristin_funding_source_search() nva_verified_funding_nfr() → nva_verified_funding_nfr_search() nva_verified_funding_nfr_item() → nva_verified_funding_nfr() (#12) BREAKING: Output columns now use snake_case: first_name, last_name, start_date, end_date, administrative_agreement (#12) Implement core endpoints (search, publication, basic Cristin) (#3) Set core infrastructure (utils-request.R, auth.R, utils-response.R) (#2)

title: NA
text: Swagger UI: https://swagger-ui.nva.unit.Documents valid search parameters, sort keys, query types

title: NA
text: Use R package httr2 - check docs, including vignette “Wrapping APIs”.

title: NA
text: exported functions use nva_ prefix Single-item getters: nva_cristin_person(id), nva_publication(id) Search/list functions: use _search suffix - nva_publication_search(), nva_cristin_person_search() Related data: nva_cristin_person_publications(), nva_publication_files() Multi-item fetchers: plural form - nva_publications(ids), nva_cristin_persons(ids)

title: NA
text: Use standard parameter names consistently: - id - Resource identifier (cristin_id, project_id, etc.) - ids - Multiple identifiers (identifiers) - query - Search text (name, title, keyword) - limit - Results per page (results) - offset - Pagination offset NVA endpoints - page - Page number Cristin endpoints (use page-based pagination) - organization - Organization filter (institution)

title: NA
text: Use snake_case column names: first_name, start_date, administrative_agreement Keep identifier NVA publication IDs (UUID format, distinct Cristin numeric IDs) Use id Cristin resource IDs

title: NA
text: HTTP requests MUST go nva_request() utils-request.R Never build requests raw httr2::request() — bypasses auth, throttling, retry, error handling

title: NA
text: Always use nva_get_label(labels) extracting human-readable names API responses ensures consistent language preference (en > nb > nn) across package Never pick hardcoded index like titles[[1]] — use nva_get_label() instead

title: NA
text: nva_request(endpoint, ...) - Build authenticated, throttled request (requests go ) nva_get(endpoint, ...) - Request + perform + parse JSON nva_get_tibble(endpoint, ...) - Request + perform + convert tibble nva_extract_id(url, resource) - Extract ID API URLs nva_get_label(labels) - Get label language preference (en > nb > nn) nva_empty_tibble(...) - Create typed empty tibble

title: NA
text: Use schema functions R/schemas.R consistent empty results:
code: if (nrow(tbl) == 0) {  return(schema_publication_search()) }

title: NA
text: Single-item getters (nva_publication, nva_cristin_person): Return raw list API Search functions: Return tibble parsed/cleaned data Search detail tibbles resource may different columns (detail endpoints return data)

title: NA
text: Validate limit bounds (1-100) search functions single-item getters must validate id non-empty

title: Getting started with nva
code: # Install from GitHub # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("roarstovner/nva")

title: Getting started with nva
text: NVA endpoints public require authentication. API key needed endpoints access non-public data. API key, set current session: persistent configuration, add NVA_API_KEY=your_key .Renviron file (use usethis::edit_r_environ() open ).
code: library(nva)  nva_set_api_key("your-api-key")  # Check if a key is configured nva_has_api_key()

title: Getting started with nva
text: nva_search() main entry point finding publications. returns tibble key metadata. result tibble columns: identifier, title, type, year, status, contributors (list), institutions (list).
code: # Basic search nva_search("climate change")  # Filter by year and limit results nva_search("machine learning", year = 2024, limit = 20)  # Filter by organization (Cristin ID, e.g. "185" for University of Oslo) nva_search("biodiversity", organization = "185")  # Filter by publication type nva_search("deep learning", type = "AcademicArticle")  # Combine multiple filters nva_search(   "renewable energy",   year = "2020,2024",    organization = "194",   scientific_value = "LevelTwo",   files = "hasPublicFiles" )

title: Getting started with nva
text: Use nva_search_aggregations() see results distributed across categories like publication type, institution, year — without fetching publications .
code: aggs <- nva_search_aggregations("climate change") aggs  # Filter to see only publication type counts aggs[aggs$aggregation == "type", ]

title: Getting started with nva
text: publication identifier search results, retrieve full record associated files.
code: # Get the full record (returns a list) pub <- nva_publication("01907b56-a6b0-7b8c-8f79-12345abcdef") pub$entityDescription$mainTitle  # Get multiple publications as a tibble pubs <- nva_publications(c("id-1", "id-2"))  # List files attached to a publication files <- nva_publication_files("01907b56-a6b0-7b8c-8f79-12345abcdef") files  # Download a file nva_download_file(files$identifier[1], destfile = "paper.pdf")

title: Getting started with nva
text: Cristin registry contains information researchers Norwegian institutions.
code: # Search for a researcher by name nva_cristin_person_search(query = "Hansen")  # Search within a specific organization nva_cristin_person_search(query = "Olsen", organization = "185")  # Get detailed info for a specific person (returns a list) person <- nva_cristin_person(12345)  # Get structured details for one or more persons as a tibble nva_cristin_persons(c(12345, 67890))  # Get a researcher's publications nva_cristin_person_publications(12345) nva_cristin_person_publications(12345, year = 2024)

title: Getting started with nva
text: Look Norwegian research institutions organizational hierarchy.
code: # Search for organizations nva_cristin_organization_search("university")  # Get a specific organization (returns a list) org <- nva_cristin_organization(185) org$labels$en # [1] "University of Oslo"  # Get multiple organizations as a tibble nva_cristin_organizations(c(185, 194))  # Explore the organizational hierarchy faculties <- nva_cristin_organization_subunits(185) faculties  # Go deeper (faculties and departments) nva_cristin_organization_subunits(185, depth = 2)  # Get publications for an organization nva_cristin_organization_publications(185, year = 2024)

title: Getting started with nva
text: Search retrieve research projects registered Cristin.
code: # Search for projects nva_cristin_project_search(query = "climate")  # Filter by status nva_cristin_project_search(status = "ACTIVE", organization = "185")  # Get a specific project (returns a list) project <- nva_cristin_project(123456)  # Get multiple projects as a tibble nva_cristin_projects(c(123456, 789012))

title: Getting started with nva
text: Search functions return limited number results default (limit = 10). larger result sets, use fetch_all = TRUE automatically paginate matching records. Cristin search endpoints (persons, organizations, projects), use page parameter manual pagination:
code: # Fetch all matching publications (may be slow for broad queries) all_pubs <- nva_search("biodiversity", organization = "185", fetch_all = TRUE)  # Cap the number of results capped <- nva_search(   "machine learning",   fetch_all = TRUE,   max_results = 500 )  # Also works for person and organization publications all_person_pubs <- nva_cristin_person_publications(12345, fetch_all = TRUE) page1 <- nva_cristin_person_search(query = "Hansen", limit = 100, page = 1) page2 <- nva_cristin_person_search(query = "Hansen", limit = 100, page = 2)

title: Authors and Citation
text: Roar Bakken Stovner. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation

what: R Client for the Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API
title: R Client for the Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API
text: nva provides R interface Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API. covers NVA publication search Cristin registry persons, organizations, projects.

title: R Client for the Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API
code: # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("roarstovner/nva")

title: R Client for the Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API
code: library(nva)  # Basic search nva_publication_search("climate change")  # Filter by year and organization nva_publication_search("machine learning", year = 2024, organization = "194")

title: R Client for the Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API
code: # Full record (returns a list) pub <- nva_publication("01907b56-a6b0-7b8c-8f79-12345abcdef")  # List and download files files <- nva_publication_files("01907b56-a6b0-7b8c-8f79-12345abcdef") nva_download_file(files$identifier[1], destfile = "paper.pdf")

title: R Client for the Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API
code: # Search for researchers nva_cristin_person_search(query = "Hansen")  # Organization hierarchy nva_cristin_organization_subunits(185, depth = 2)  # Research projects nva_cristin_project_search(query = "climate", status = "ACTIVE")

title: R Client for the Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API
code: # Automatically fetch all pages all_pubs <- nva_publication_search("biodiversity", organization = "185", fetch_all = TRUE)

title: R Client for the Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API
text: endpoints public. non-public data, set API key: add NVA_API_KEY=your_key .Renviron (use usethis::edit_r_environ()).
code: nva_set_api_key("your-api-key")

title: R Client for the Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API
text: Getting started vignette Function reference NVA API documentation

what: nva: R Client for the Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API — nva-package
title: nva: R Client for the Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API — nva-package
text: Provides functions accessing Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API. Includes support searching publications, retrieving metadata, accessing Cristin data, downloading files.

title: nva: R Client for the Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API — nva-package
text: Functions package follow consistent return type convention: Singular functions (nva_publication(), nva_cristin_person()) return raw list objects API, preserving full JSON structure maximum flexibility. Plural functions (nva_publications(), nva_cristin_persons()) return tibbles parsed cleaned data. tibbles may different columns search results since detail endpoints provide information. Search functions (ending _search, like nva_publication_search()) return tibbles standardized columns optimized browsing results.

title: nva: R Client for the Norwegian National Research Archive (NVA) API — nva-package
text: Maintainer: Roar Bakken Stovner robast@oslomet.

title: Get publications for a Cristin organization — nva_cristin_organization_publications
text: id Cristin organization identifier limit Number results return per page (default: 10, max: 100) offset Offset pagination (default: 0) year Filter publication year. Supports single year (e.g., 2024) range comma-separated values (e.g., "2020,2024" years 2020-2024) type Filter publication type fetch_all TRUE, fetch publications. Default: FALSE max_results Maximum results fetch_all = TRUE (default: Inf)

what: Download a file from a publication — nva_download_file

text: Downloads file associated publication local path.

title: Download a file from a publication — nva_download_file
code: nva_download_file(id, destfile = NULL, overwrite = FALSE, progress = TRUE)

title: Download a file from a publication — nva_download_file
text: id File identifier (nva_publication_files()) destfile Destination file path. NULL, uses original filename current working directory. overwrite Logical. existing files overwritten? Default FALSE. progress Logical. Show download progress bar? Default TRUE

title: Download a file from a publication — nva_download_file
text: Invisibly returns path downloaded file.

title: Download a file from a publication — nva_download_file
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Get files for a publication files <- nva_publication_files("01907b56-a6b0-7b8c-8f79-12345abcdef")  # Download the first file nva_download_file(files$identifier[1], destfile = "paper.pdf")  # Download with original filename nva_download_file(files$identifier[1]) } # }

title: Search NVA publications — nva_publication_search
text: Search Norwegian National Research Archive publications matching query string.

title: Search NVA publications — nva_publication_search
code: nva_publication_search(   query,   limit = 10L,   offset = 0L,   sort = c("relevance", "modifiedDate", "createdDate", "publishedDate", "title",     "category", "publicationDate", "unitId"),   sort_order = c("desc", "asc"),   organization = NULL,   year = NULL,   year_since = NULL,   year_before = NULL,   type = NULL,   context_type = NULL,   contributor = NULL,   contributor_name = NULL,   doi = NULL,   title = NULL,   abstract = NULL,   tags = NULL,   journal = NULL,   publisher = NULL,   series = NULL,   issn = NULL,   isbn = NULL,   license = NULL,   files = NULL,   funding = NULL,   funding_source = NULL,   funding_identifier = NULL,   scientific_value = NULL,   scientific_index_status = NULL,   scientific_report_period = NULL,   created_since = NULL,   created_before = NULL,   modified_since = NULL,   modified_before = NULL,   published_since = NULL,   published_before = NULL,   publication_language = NULL,   status = NULL,   orcid = NULL,   project = NULL,   unit = NULL,   top_level_organization = NULL,   exclude_subunits = NULL,   handle = NULL,   cristin_identifier = NULL,   scopus_identifier = NULL,   course = NULL,   vocabulary = NULL,   ...,   fetch_all = FALSE,   max_results = Inf )  nva_search(...)

title: Search NVA publications — nva_publication_search
text: query Search query string limit Number results return per page (default: 10, max: 100) offset Offset pagination (default: 0) sort Sort order. One "relevance" (default), "modifiedDate", "createdDate", "publishedDate", "title", "category", "publicationDate", "unitId" sort_order Sort direction: "desc" (default) descending "asc" ascending. applies sort specified ("relevance") organization Filter organization Cristin ID (e.g., "185" UiO) year Filter publication year. Supports single year (e.g., 2024) range comma-separated values (e.g., "2020,2024" years 2020-2024) year_since Filter minimum publication year (inclusive) year_before Filter maximum publication year (exclusive) type Filter publication type (e.g., "AcademicArticle") context_type Filter publication context type (e.g., "Journal", "Report", "Anthology", "Book") contributor Filter Cristin person ID contributor_name Filter contributor name (fuzzy match) doi Filter DOI title Filter title text abstract Filter abstract text tags Filter tags/keywords journal Filter journal name, ID, ISSN publisher Filter publisher name ID series Filter series name, ID, title, ISSN issn Filter ISSN isbn Filter ISBN license Filter license files Filter file status (e.g., "hasPublicFiles") funding Combined funding search (matches funding ID source) funding_source Filter funding source text funding_identifier Filter funding project ID scientific_value Filter NPI level ("LevelOne", "LevelTwo") scientific_index_status Filter reporting status scientific_report_period Filter NVI reporting period year created_since Filter creation date lower bound (ISO 8601) created_before Filter creation date upper bound (ISO 8601) modified_since Filter modification date lower bound (ISO 8601) modified_before Filter modification date upper bound (ISO 8601) published_since Filter published date lower bound (ISO 8601) published_before Filter published date upper bound (ISO 8601) publication_language Filter language URI (e.g., "http://lexvo.org/id/iso639-3/eng") status Filter publication status orcid Filter ORCID project Filter Cristin project ID unit Filter organizational unit ID top_level_organization Filter top-level organization ID exclude_subunits TRUE, exclude publications subunits filtering organization handle Filter handle URL cristin_identifier Filter Cristin identifier scopus_identifier Filter Scopus identifier course Filter course code vocabulary Filter subject vocabulary URI ... Additional API query parameters passed directly (see NVA Search API docs) fetch_all TRUE, fetch matching results (may slow large result sets). Default: FALSE max_results Maximum results fetch fetch_all = TRUE (default: Inf)

title: Search NVA publications — nva_publication_search
text: tibble columns: identifier Publication identifier title Main title type Publication type year Publication year status Publication status contributors List contributor names institutions List top-level institution names doi DOI available

title: Search NVA publications — nva_publication_search
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Simple search nva_publication_search("climate change")  # Search with filters nva_publication_search("machine learning", year = 2024, limit = 20)  # Fetch all results for a specific organization nva_publication_search("biodiversity", organization = "185", fetch_all = TRUE)  # Filter by DOI nva_publication_search("climate", doi = "10.1371")  # Filter by NPI level nva_publication_search("machine learning", scientific_value = "LevelTwo")  # Only publications with public files, published since 2024 nva_publication_search("AI", files = "hasPublicFiles", published_since = "2024")  # Sort by publication date, ascending (oldest first) nva_publication_search("climate", sort = "publicationDate", sort_order = "asc")  # Sort by modified date, descending (most recent first - default) nva_publication_search("AI", sort = "modifiedDate", sort_order = "desc")  # Pass additional API parameters directly nva_publication_search("test", series = "MySeriesName") } # }

what: Get aggregations (facet counts) for an NVA search — nva_publication_search_aggregations
title: Get aggregations (facet counts) for an NVA search — nva_publication_search_aggregations
text: Returns facet counts search query, showing results distributed across categories like publication type, institution, year, etc. Accepts filter parameters nva_publication_search().

title: Get aggregations (facet counts) for an NVA search — nva_publication_search_aggregations
code: nva_publication_search_aggregations(   query,   limit = 10L,   offset = 0L,   sort = c("relevance", "modifiedDate", "createdDate", "publishedDate", "title",     "category", "publicationDate", "unitId"),   sort_order = c("desc", "asc"),   ... )  nva_search_aggregations(...)

title: Get aggregations (facet counts) for an NVA search — nva_publication_search_aggregations
text: query Search query string limit Number results return per page (default: 10, max: 100) offset Offset pagination (default: 0) sort Sort order. One "relevance" (default), "modifiedDate", "createdDate", "publishedDate", "title", "category", "publicationDate", "unitId" sort_order Sort direction: "desc" (default) descending "asc" ascending. applies sort specified ("relevance") ... Additional API query parameters passed directly (see NVA Search API docs)

title: Get aggregations (facet counts) for an NVA search — nva_publication_search_aggregations
text: tibble columns: aggregation Aggregation field name (e.g., "type", "topLevelOrganization") key Bucket key (identifier value) label Human-readable label (English preferred, falls back Norwegian) count Number matching publications

title: Get aggregations (facet counts) for an NVA search — nva_publication_search_aggregations
text: API returns 100 buckets per aggregation field. Fields fewer natural categories (e.g., "type", "files", "license") return values, high-cardinality fields (e.g., "contributor", "journal", "topLevelOrganization") capped top 100 count. get granular breakdowns, narrow search filters. Available aggregation fields: type, topLevelOrganization, contributor, journal, series, publisher, fundingSource, scientificIndex, license, files.

title: Get aggregations (facet counts) for an NVA search — nva_publication_search_aggregations
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # See how "climate" results break down by type and institution nva_publication_search_aggregations("climate")  # Filter to just publication type counts nva_publication_search_aggregations("climate") |>   dplyr::filter(aggregation == "type")  # Aggregations for a filtered search nva_publication_search_aggregations("machine learning", year = 2024, organization = "185") } # }
